full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG GI NYAMS LEN ZAB GNAD KYI SMON LAM GYI RIM PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI RGYUD KYI DGONGS PA JI BZHIN DU DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI LAM NYAMS LEN GYI RIM PA'I ZAB GNAD THAMS @007B CAD MA TSANG BA MED PAR BSDUS NAS SMON LAM GYI RIM PA BYA TSUL 'DI YANG, MDO STOD DGON SDE'I SA NAS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA RIN CHEN 'OD ZER GYIS BSKUL TE PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS SE RA BYES BLA BRANG DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DBANG CHEN THUGS SPRUL MKHYEN PA'I GTER MNGA' BA'I, ,RIM GNYIS DKA' GNAD MA LUS 'GRO RNAMS LA, ,BRTZE BA'I THUGS KYIS LEGS PAR STZOL MDZAD PA, ,RDO RJE 'DZIN PA'I ZHABS PAD BRTAN GYUR CIG ,SER BYES MKHAN ZUR BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA YIS, , LHAG PA'I LHA MCHOG PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI, ,SMON @008A *, ,LAM PAR BSKRUN RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,'GRO KUN DBANG CHEN GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,PAR 'DI SER BYES GRVA TSANG DU BZHUGS, ,)
